import React from 'react' import './App.css'; class App extends React.Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = { name: '', email: '', cpf: 0, adress: '', city: '', state: '', house: false, apt: false, curriculum: '', job: '', jobDescription: '', } } upperCase = (e) => { const { value, name } = e.target this.setState({ [name]: value.toUpperCase() }) } removeSpecial=(e) render() { return (
Dados Pessoais
Dados do seu último emprego
) } } export default App;
